title: New Honor System in bots games?
body: Could you level up your honor by getting honored by people in Co-op VS A.I. games? And if so, are there limitations? do you need to be a lower level to get more "honor points" like the IP/XP Rewards that get lower the higher your level is?

replies.body: I believe you'll still be getting the same amount of honor experience in Co-op games as you do in PVP matches! You should also be getting the same amount of honor experience regardless of your Summoner level.
